evidence.text: The Court issued its Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law on January 6, 2023
The Court issued an Order on February 4, 2023

extracted.value: February 4, 2023: Modification of the injunction schedule

evidence.text: Defendants moved on March 7, 2024 for a partial stay of the Court's January 6, 2023 order

extracted.value: March 7, 2024: Partial stay of the injunction

evidence.text: The Court issued an Order on February 4, 2023, which first addressed the need to modify the schedule for Defendants to produce a remedial map given their intention to file an appeal. The Court made it clear that it had "no intention to proceed... The Court hereby exercises its authority under Rule 62(d) to modify its injunction to preserve the status quo on appeal. The last paragraph of the Court's Order of January 6, 2023 (Dkt. No. 493) at page 30 is modified to now read

The Court issued an Order on February 4, 2023, which first addressed the need to modify the schedule for Defendants to produce a remedial map given their intention to file an appeal. The Court made it clear that it had "no intention to proceed... The Court hereby exercises its authority under Rule 62(d) to modify its injunction to preserve the status quo on appeal. The last paragraph of the Court's Order of January 6, 2023 (Dkt. No. 493) at page 30 is modified to now read
The Court issued an Order on February 4, 2023, which first addressed the need to modify the schedule for Defendants to produce a remedial map given their intention to file an appeal.

Order and Opinion granting in part 51 Motion to Stay and Memorandum in Support, ... AND IT IS SO ORDERED The Court hereby orders the parties to file any responses in opposition to the pending motions by Friday, December 17, 2021. The Court hereby exercises its authority to stay the case until January 18, 2022.
